rooms.description: Open plan area combining living and kitchen with large windows ensuring natural ventilation as per Vastu. It features a modern open layout.
Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom located in the eastern direction for enhanced energy flow.
Comfortable guest room placed on the north side of the ground floor.
Functional area for work or study located in a quiet corner adhering to Vastu's directional alignment.
Small storage room placed conveniently near the living area.

openings.description: Large window ensuring ample natural light as per Vastu principles.
Provides outdoor space with a view of the garden and swimming pool.
